title: The Time Portal 2: Escape In Time
description: The Russian president wants Lucky and the professor’s secrets. The Arabs want them too. Vladimir Putin is determined to secure the secret recipe that will forever eliminate the need for oil for any type of transportation, ever . . . again. Putin has assigned this task to his Head of Security, Oleg Karpov. It is up to Lucky to protect the brilliant, mad scientist and his “magnetic propulsion system”, but can he outwit legions of Russian agents? From the KGB headquarters in Moscow to the ghost town of Rhyolite, Lucky, utilizes his time travel ability and races to eradicate assassins, yet increase his wealth at the same time. Can he do it this time? Will Lucky be “lucky?” One never knows what can happen when you enter . . . the time portal.
author: Joe Corso
